Name: Football Player Substitution
Description: A substitution in soccer is when one player is taken off and another put on the field in replacement during a match

Properties.Name: Minute
Properties.Description: The minute during the game in which the substitution happened

Properties.Name: Off
Properties.Description: The player who came off the field

Properties.Name: On
Properties.Description: The player who came on the field in replacement

Properties.Name: Match
Properties.Description: The match in which this substitution was made
